title: Silver+ Team Masters of Darkness
body:
Hi everyone,

I decided to create a ranked team for anyone Silver or above.
What I'm looking for people with a positive attitude who won't troll, be mean to fellow players etc.

Requirements:
Curse
Working Mic if possible
Silver or above 
Won't quit at the 1st sign of losing
Know how to play at least 2 roles


Roles available:

Top:
Sup:


Pls copy this and fill it in below.

IGN:
Age:
Rank:
Roles:

replies.body:
IGN: NightFight

Age: 21

Rank: Currently plat 4 however have been between plat 1 - 3 for a lot of last season

Roles: I main Top and ADC however I play mid decently and can fill sup and jungle if really needed.

Roles: Any
IGN: NightTemplar or Wolves you have me added already i think
Age:20
Rank: Gold V (atm)

Roles : any where needed 
IGN: Posso The Pimp
Age: 16 
Rank: silver 4 (atm) 
Will never give up and can be a good leader some times

IGN: Blàçk Frôst
Age: 20
Rank: g5
Roles:sup/jungle/top/mid/adc

looking to have fun and determined to stick with team for whole season

IGN: x Nubcakey x
Age: 22
Rank: Silver 5 OCE, Gold 1 NA.
Roles: Can do all but prefer support/top

IGN: pyrox88
Age:19
Rank: Silver5 (play with me and you know im not really s5) 
Roles: can play all lanes but prefer adc and support

IGN: Knuuckles
Age: 19 (and a half!)
Rank: silver 3
Roles: mid/supp
won't be on tonight but ill chuck you an add and play some games some time tomorrow
